org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.core.jmx

Class RMJMXHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.jmx.AbstractJMXHelper
      • org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.core.jmx.RMJMXHelper

  • public final class RMJMXHelper
extends AbstractJMXHelper
    This helper class represents the RMI and RO based JMX monitoring infrastructure of the Resource Manager.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 1.0
    See Also:
    AbstractJMXHelper
